Simplicity/Complexity: Adjust complexity to suit the topic, simplifying where possible while embracing depth when necessary.
Formality Level: Balance between semi-formal and informal tones, depending on the content's nature.
Narrative Voice: Mix first-person and third-person narratives to connect with the audience and offer insights.
Sentence Structure: Utilize a variety of structures to maintain interest and clarity.
Descriptive Language Use: Emphasize descriptive language to bring concepts to life, particularly when describing visuals.
Tone: Blend serious analysis with engaging storytelling, reflecting the diverse content themes.
